video:video.video:title: For Educators: Student Thought Leaders KNOW the Cloud
video:video.video:description: Recorded as part of the Virtual Faculty Summit on June 21, 2012. As an instructor you are faced with the challenge of preparing your students to be thought leaders when they graduate in 1-5 years. You&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure Camp Online: Securing, Connecting, and Scaling
video:video.video:description: Now that you've learned about the core Windows Azure services, there are several questions that might come to mind. For instance, how do you authenticate and authorize users for your application? &#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure Camp Online: Storage
video:video.video:description: Windows Azure Storage is a highly available and massively scalable storage service in the cloud for storing a variety of forms of data. In this session, you will learn how to get started using Windows&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure Camp Online: Understanding SQL Azure
video:video.video:description: What if you could have rich SQL database functionality as a continuously available service on the Windows Azure Platform without having to worry about purchasing, installing and maintaining database&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure Camp Online: Getting Started with Windows Azure
video:video.video:description: Windows Azure provides a comprehensive platform for building, deploying, and running applications in the cloud. In this session we quickly answer the question &quot;What is Windows Azure?&quot;. You&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure Roles (Part 1, Episode 6 - Hands-on Windows Azure Webinar)
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we discuss what is a role and the differences between each of the three Windows Azure roles. In this 3-part webinar series, we'll explore how to build solutions for the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Windows Azure Architecture (Part 1, Episode 5 - Hands-on Windows Azure Webinar)
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we'll go through the architecture that makes up the Windows Azure Platform and talk about the compute, storage, and management services. In this 3-part webinar series, we'll&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The Windows Azure Platform (Part 1, Episode 4 - Hands-on Windows Azure Webinar)
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we look at the full Windows Azure Platform and get a high level understanding of each of the existing components and some of the new ones coming. In this 3-part webinar series,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Cloud Services (Part 1, Episode 3 - Hands-on Windows Azure Webinar)
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we discuss the different types of Cloud services and the management/accountabilities of each. In this 3-part webinar series, we'll explore how to build solutions for the Cloud.&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Load Patterns (Part 1, Episode 2 - Hands-on Windows Azure Webinar)
